decisions.label: Determine if Addition or Renovation/Upfit

decisions.label: Is Number of Screen Stories greater than variable

decisions.description: determines which datatable from the review sq ft screen gets looped through
decisions.name: New_Construction_or_Multi_Family
decisions.label: New Construction or Multi Family?

Flow.description: BC - Adding validation for fire protection/detection required

formulas.description: will populate the same back-office field depending which of the two (addition or renovation/upfit) square footages are popoulated
formulas.name: Addition_Upfit_assignment
ResidentialBuildingElectricalNeeded
formulas.expression: IF(AND( NOT(INCLUDES({!Permit.Work_being_completed_by_Applicant__c}, "Electrical")), OR( ISPICKVAL({!Permit.MUSW__Work_Type2__c}, "New Construction"), ISPICKVAL({!Permit.MUSW__Work_Type2__c}, "Multi-Family/Apartment"), INCLUDES({!Permit.Trade_Types__c}, "Electrical"))), True, False)

formulas.description: returns true if "will you be doing the work yourself?" is yes and electrical is included in the corresponding multi-select
formulas.name: ResidentialElectricalSelf
TextSquareFootage
formulas.expression: TEXT(if(ISBLANK({!X1st_Floor}), 0, {!X1st_Floor}) + if(ISBLANK({!X2nd_Floor}), 0, {!X2nd_Floor}) + if(ISBLANK({!X3rd_Floor}), 0, {!X3rd_Floor}) + if(ISBLANK({!X3rd_Floor}), 0, {!X3rd_Floor}) + if(ISBLANK({!Deck_Dimensions}), 0, {!Deck_Dimensions}) + if(ISBLANK({!Garage_Attached_Dimensions}), 0, {!Garage_Attached_Dimensions}) + if(ISBLANK({!Carport_Dimensions}), 0, {!Carport_Dimensions}) + if(ISBLANK({!Other_Detached_Structure_Dimensions}), 0, {!Other_Detached_Structure_Dimensions}) + if(ISBLANK({!Porch_Dimensions}), 0, {!Porch_Dimensions}) + if(ISBLANK({!Primary_Occupancy_Sq_Ft}), 0, {!Primary_Occupancy_Sq_Ft}) + if(ISBLANK({!Secondary_Occupancy_Sq_Ft_If_applicable}), 0, {!Secondary_Occupancy_Sq_Ft_If_applicable}))

formulas.name: TotalSquareFootage
formulas.expression: if(ISBLANK({!X1st_Floor}), 0, {!X1st_Floor}) + if(ISBLANK({!X2nd_Floor}), 0, {!X2nd_Floor}) + if(ISBLANK({!X3rd_Floor}), 0, {!X3rd_Floor}) + if(ISBLANK({!X3rd_Floor}), 0, {!X3rd_Floor}) + if(ISBLANK({!Deck_Dimensions}), 0, {!Deck_Dimensions}) + if(ISBLANK({!Garage_Attached_Dimensions}), 0, {!Garage_Attached_Dimensions}) + if(ISBLANK({!Carport_Dimensions}), 0, {!Carport_Dimensions}) + if(ISBLANK({!Other_Detached_Structure_Dimensions}), 0, {!Other_Detached_Structure_Dimensions}) + if(ISBLANK({!Porch_Dimensions}), 0, {!Porch_Dimensions}) + if(ISBLANK({!Primary_Occupancy_Sq_Ft}), 0, {!Primary_Occupancy_Sq_Ft}) + if(ISBLANK({!Secondary_Occupancy_Sq_Ft_If_applicable}), 0, {!Secondary_Occupancy_Sq_Ft_If_applicable})

formulas.name: Validation_Formula
formulas.expression: IF(AND( CONTAINS({!Is_Fire_Protection_Detection_Required} , 'Not Required'), OR( CONTAINS({!Is_Fire_Protection_Detection_Required} , 'Fire Protection'), CONTAINS({!Is_Fire_Protection_Detection_Required} , 'Fire Detection'))), false, true)

Flow.label: (Permit Flow) Commercial Permit

fields.name: Copy_1_of_Quick_Permit_Project_Header_Display
fields.fieldText: New {!Record_Type_Name} Application

fields.name: Residential_Permit_Project_Details_Display
fields.fieldText:
Project Details

Provide us with additional details about the project by filling in the details below.

validationRule.errorMessage: Check Is Fire Protection/Detection required? field. If Fire Protection and/or Fire Detection is required uncheck Not Required.

fields.name: Display_message_multi_family
fields.fieldText: Note: In the Town of Clayton permits can only be issued on a per BUILDING basis. Please submit individual permit applications for each Building in your project.

fields.name: Click_Next
fields.fieldText:
If selected Trade permit please do not fill out any fields below. Instead click the Next button to fill out a Trade Permit Application.


﻿

fields.name: owner_occupancy_required_helper_text
fields.fieldText: If you qualify yourself as an owner-occupant you MUST own the project and occupy a full year after CO has been issued

fields.name: Are_you_an_employee_acting_on_behalf_of_the_owner
fields.fieldText: Are you an employee acting on behalf of the owner?

fields.name: Are_you_are_licensed_general_contractor
fields.fieldText: Are you a licensed general contractor?

fields.name: Does_the_owner_of_the_business_own_the_building
fields.fieldText: Does the owner of the business own the building?
fields.helpText:
If answered Yes, must provide Appendix F affidavit on submittal.

If answered No, you are required to have a licensed General Contractor

fields.name: Are_additional_trades_required
fields.fieldText: Are you modifying or extending a(n) Electrical/Mechanical/Plumbing/Fire trade?

fields.name: Fire_Protection_Detection_Validation_Text
fields.fieldText: If Fire Protection and/or Fire Detection is required uncheck Not Required.

visibilityRule.conditionLogic: (1 AND 2 AND 3) OR (1 AND 3) OR (2 AND 3)

fields.name: Fire_cost_helper_text
fields.fieldText: (Note: Projected total fire cost should include Fire Sprinkler and Fire Alarm)

fields.name: Is_foundation_24_or_less_above_finished_grade
fields.fieldText: Is foundation 24" or less above finished grade?
fields.helpText: Please request an open floor framing inspection for this project (to be automated at a later date)

fields.name: Does_the_lot_have_had_existing_water_and_sewer_service
fields.fieldText: Does the lot have/had existing water and sewer service?

fields.name: Will_this_addition_require_electrical_service_modification
fields.fieldText: Will this addition require electrical service modification?
fields.helpText: Select 'Yes' if power will be dropped, reconnected, and/or relocated.

fields.name: Are_you_adding_a_new_power_meter
fields.fieldText: Are you adding a new power meter?

fields.name: Will_any_underground_electrical_work_be_performed
fields.fieldText: Will any underground electrical work be performed?

fields.name: Are_Solar_Panels_being_installed_Field
fields.helpText: Please note that you will require to upload solar system designs & plans if answered Yes

fields.name: Do_you_need_temporary_power
fields.helpText: (T-POLE) Power pole for construction of project. Removed from project site when Conditional Power or Permanent Power is approved and released.

fields.name: Conditional_Power
fields.helpText: (Application required) Grant when project has made safe as required for the energizing of a portion or all the electrical system before CO.

fields.name: Conditional_Gas
fields.helpText: (Gas Meter approved to be set) Gas system has been tested and approved for placement of gas meter prior to CO.

fields.name: Structure_Heights
fields.fieldText: Structure Height/Number of Stories/Number of Units per Bldg

fields.name: New_Number_of_Stories
fields.helpText: Half-stories are applicable (please add .5 to the end of the number if a half-story is applicable to your addition/apartment)

fields.name: Number_of_Stories
fields.helpText: Half-stories are applicable (please add .5 to the end of the number if a half-story is applicable to your new construction)

fields.name: New_Structure_Heightt
fields.helpText: Enter height in ft.

fields.name: detached_structure_helper_text
fields.fieldText: (Note: for any detached structure that is planned to be added to the Apartment/Multi-Family complex, please fill out a separate permit for a New Construction)

fields.name: Enter_all_that_apply
fields.fieldText:
*Enter all square footage/measurements that apply.

If structure includes multiple levels/floors, include total square footage across all floors.

fields.name: New_Addition_Square_Footage
fields.fieldText: Your New Total Square Footage Is

fields.name: RecordTypeHeader
fields.fieldText: New {!Record_Type_Name} Application

fields.name: sqft_helper
fields.fieldText: NOTE: To update all fields for a single column, click the checkbox when editing before typing the value in.

fields.name: table_validation_text
fields.fieldText: Please ensure you have filled in every field such that your application is sufficient.

variables.description: should be "True" if there are empty fields in the sqft datatables
variables.name: Empty_Fields_in_table
